with many included effects and features ie multi-burst,43
timer,94
and anti- shake.  The only other app coming close is the Awesome Camera,57
but only has approx 26 special effects compared. To the approx 36 + with the Camera 360 Ultimate. With this said out of the 25 + camera apps out there this one wins hands down for a free and or paid app mon better.  Also for aft. Mkt. editors BeFunky is excellent with Pixir-O-Matic,50
Coming in second.  This E-Val  comes from a photographer with 40+ years in the field.o,15
